no idea why people praise YIFY rips. the video quality on all their rips look like low-bitrate xvid. it's anything but "10" - rather just gritty and full of artifacts as soon as anything on the screen moves. it's almost as if they are using a crappy h.264 encoder instead of x264, or just don't know how to use the advanced settings of x264.
